roleset.name: to approve

example.name: ratify-v: transitive
example.text: By 1987 , then - Speaker Jim Wright was discussing arms control in Moscow with Mikhail Gorbachev and then attempting to direct the president , through an appropriations rider , to treat the Soviets as though the Senate had ratified SALT II .

example.name: ratify-v: all arguments
example.text: The broadcasters were , after all , documenting the game , ratifying its occurrence for millions outside the Stick .

example.name: ratification-n
example.text: When writing the Constitution , the framers expected the Senate to handle important issues , particularly the ratification of treaties , while the Executive would attend to matters of lesser consequence .

roleset.note: RATIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ratify' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from ratify.01-v predicate notes)
